alert.note: Alert for Fall River (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS RapidCity (Western South Dakota and Northeastern Wyoming)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 09 at 4:16PM MDT by NWS RapidCity
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT EAST CENTRAL FALL RIVER COUNTY THROUGH 445 PM MDT... At 415 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Hay Canyon Butte, or 19 miles southeast of Hot Springs, moving southeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor hail damage to vegetation is possible. This storm will remain over mainly rural areas of east central Fall River County, northeast of Oelrichs. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
